header.rec_loc: In my mother's car between Rushden and Bedford
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Greetings, train journeys, university, ANON, ANON's family, journey home, family, recordings, Dad's birthday, the weather, driving, extended family, health, ANON at university, travel, dairy intolerance, ANON's clubs, driving routes, injuries, the band, Christmas, dinner, broken clothes, curry,
